# This goes in the survey google sheet block for reading in the doe

```{r}
library(data.table)
doe <- fread('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jhelvy/tmfConjoint/master/survey/survey_doe.csv')

id <- 1
if (id > max(doe$respID)) {id <- id %% max(doe$respID)}

doe <- doe[respID == id]
```
